## Events.CommentBase.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `CommentBase` class

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_comment | [WorkspaceComment](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.md) | _(Optional)_ The comment this event corresponds to. Undefined for a blank event. |
